mapper.update: update post set replyCounts = replyCounts + 1 where postNo = #{postNo} and boardName = #{boardName}
mapper.select: select * from reply where postNo = #{postNo} and boardName = #{boardName} order by replyNo
mapper.delete: delete from reply where replyNo = #{replyNo} and boardName = #{boardName} and postNo = #{postNo}
